lead_paragraph: An independent report commissioned by the city comptroller’s office found the city’s retirement system needed additional resources, staffing and the basic tools required to understand the complicated risk embedded in its investments.

headline.main: Report on Troubled New York City Pension System

snippet: An independent report commissioned by the city comptroller’s office found the city’s retirement system needed additional resources, staffing and the basic tools required to understand the complicated risk embedded in its investments.
